content.detailedDescription: Traveling on haxton rd going home from work, girlfriend was with me .I heard her scream oh crap what is that? i looked over thru the passenger windows to take a look what she was pointing at. i saw a dark object coming towards us from the south by lummi island, as it got closer i could see a triangle shape something moving towards us. i had  not idea what is was. no plane i ever saw was like this. i turned on smokehouse road headed car for home but stopped  to get a better look. the triangle came towards us it was  quite large maybe 100 feet long. it passed over us then turned around and headed back south towards lummi island i think,lost sight of it thru the trees as i got  in car and drove for home. i didn't look back. i  and girlfriend was pretty scared.
content.summary: Triangle shaped,100 feet long

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report online with witness on the phone at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, on december 1st, 2015
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

my mother, who lives at the foothills of superstition mountain, called me to tell me she saw lights on the mountain. when i built the house for her i warned her not to be frightened of the lights on and near the mountain. i went outside, it was 7:30 pm, and saw a very bright white light on top of ship rock, the tallest point of the superstition mountains. the light was very bright and brighter than a landing light on a aircraft. i looked up in the sky and saw a craft with lights encircling it hovering about 2 miles high over the bright light. the craft had lights circling the outside of the craft and was just hovering. then i saw what appeared to be a surface to air missile from the bright spot on the mountain shoot directly up at the craft and be absorbed by the craft. no sound, no shudder, i then thought maybe it was a smaller craft returning to the larger ship. the smaller ship left a trail behind it. i heard no noise. then the light on the mountains turned a blueish cast. the lights seemed to light up the whole south side of the mountain, from my view point. i watched for two hours, or until 9:30 pm. i had to get up early and went to bed.
content.summary: My mother who lives at the foothills of superstition, called me to tell me she saw lights on the mountain.

content.detailedDescription:
Fill out with witness on the phone, at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, on december 1st, 2015
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

in the summer of  1984, about august, while working at a service station in bullhead city arizona, i looked up and saw an airplane and a silver colored saucer almost collide. the customer i was waiting on also saw the saucer and when he went into his car to get his camera it had sped away. it appeared that the saucer stopped and hovered so as to not interfere with the small airplane with a red stripe on it. the saucer seemed to be coming south down the mohave/colorado river and after missing the airplane, continued it path until it was almost directly over me. i raised my arms and yelled hello at it and i thought i heard a hello back. it then zoomed away in seconds.I just want to know if anybody else saw this saucer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: In the summer of  1984, while working at a gas station in bullhead city arizizona, i looked and saw an airplane and a silver colored saucer almost collide.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving friend home that night october 31to the 5of november  coming  down the road we stop too  the picture of the moon and as isaid it was just wondering  took me awhile to  to get  nice  photo shot when haven  got  home it's  mind blowing we saw and here is the  pictures of this it whow.Quebéc st.Jerome  prevost

content.detailedDescription:
Bright orb observed in cloud (e), hovered, moved (n) into another cloud and disappeared.

i was driving south on 18th street in lafayette about two blocks north of jefferson high school. in a brief glance to the east i observed a white star-like object leave a cloud formation and travel for about 3 seconds to another cloud formation and disappear. no tail was observed. the object's size at arm's length was between 1/16 and 1/8th of an inch in diameter. it traveled in a northeastern direction. at the same time there was a single engine prop plane traveling south below the object in question. i estimate the angle observed above the horizon to be approximately 50 degrees.

i thought the object could be a meteor, but it did not travel at a steep angle nor did it have a tail or fade gradually. it was one of those experiences that cause you to catch your breath momentarily. intuitively there was something different about the object.
content.summary: Reference original case 28902. current report being used as training tool. asd/nd

content.detailedDescription: I was at laguna lake taking photos of the dry lake bed.  taking groups of 5 photos to combine into hdr panorama.  when i took the second set of 5, there was a very loud noise coming from my hearing aids, from one side to the other.  the noise was similar to the sound of a theremin.  it startled me but i went on and took all the photos and went home.  upon looking at the completed image, there was a single disk shaped object in the image.  i checked the original images and found the disk shaped object only appears in the first image of the second group of 5.
content.summary: Object seen in image after hearing sound while shooting photos.

content.detailedDescription: i was out on my porch on 11-26-15 watching this massive ball of energy changing size,shape,color, moving up and down a couple times it would spiral upward like it was showing off ? it seemed to get closer and then two orbs came out of it headed for me, i went inside to grab coat gloves hat i thought i was going for a ride not scared at all? so i went back out and they the orbs were just hanging out when i would flash my light at it it would flash back ,i walked around the yard and the would move so as to be in sight like they were following me around, it seemed to be higher then the clouds would be but closer then the moon.. well it is now the 1st of december six days later every evening this orb shows up.. in what seems to be are common meeting place around dusk 6:30pm and on and yes i flash it with flashlight it flashes back and moves around as if to follow me...I expect to see the little fella tonight 12-1-15 , to much to talk about ,3 or 4 weeks before this ive been getting messages from a unknown i address him as lyrics ? would love to tell the story to much to wright i don't care what you think of me believe me i didn't think i was suppose to say anything about this but  lyrics said it was ok so their you go thankyou for listing
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two orbs came out of ball of energy

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving home from the department store. we were driving down palmer road at a stop light.  we hear no sound but we see a massive object with red and white lights blinking, decending towards the streeting.  there are two airports near our house, one a military airport. we assumed it was an airliner.  out of fear i swerved off the road and into a nearby street, scaring my wife even more but i thought i was avoiding that object hitting us. the object was decending very slowly yet at a sharp decent towards the street. 

while on the nearby street, we still eyeball the object as it quickly jolts up, followed by another light and disappears from view.  my wife and i saw the object, and neither one of us are crazy.
content.summary: Ufo in canton michigan decended

content.detailedDescription: I have had several meetings. the last two were in my house. the first was about 5am summer. i had made a cup of tea and taken it back to bed. a large entity glided into my room, looked at me and then glided backwards out of the room. i was really frightened...But woke up later to apparently have drank the tea and gone to sleep. i can't believe this as i was so frightened and also can't remember drinking the tea. the second i had gone to bed, i felt anxious for some reason and couldn't get to sleep. i felt a need to look to the side...Tried to resist...But looked. there was a grey (but with a bulbous head) crouching by my bed. i screamed and tried to sit up ( more reaction i think than choice), and it jumped at me and pressed me down. it had strong legs and fingers. almost frog like. i can't remember anything until i woke in the morning. is it possible to talk to someone about this please. thank you xxx
content.summary: Alien beings in my house

content.detailedDescription:
While playing poker at a 17th floor apt. we heard some pops/explosions sounds that at first seemed like fireworks or gun shots. when we looked out the window we observed this rather strange star-like object hovering and dropping star-like objects  directly under it that seemed to be making these explosions and disappearing. it looked like fireworks but still oddly was very different, as it seemed a rather strange display of fireworks. the ufo would suddenly get brighter and revert back seemingly without much order. it was a bit higher than where we were and approximately 2km away. this happened for about 5 minutes, slowly diminishing the amount of objects that exploded being dropped. at one point during this it seemed to cast a light which made us think it might have been a helicopter. we tried to decipher what it was as it sometimes seemed to exhibit a helicopters behavior, a comet, a drone or balloon with fireworks, but we ended ruling those things out to due to its strange behavior. after or maybe even during this it started moving horizontally west, while still leaving some of these objects behind, but this time it seemed more like star dust and no explosions were made. some of these "stars"would veer to the right and left of the object. this happened for another couple of minutes or so until it seemed like it was consumed by this fire with many sparks, like if it were exploding, emitting a lot of light. but it emerged out of this like nothing happened and continued on its path west. we then went to the balcony of the apartment to be able to see the rest of its path. at this point it seemed to seemingly interchange many colors without much order. it would usually be white/silver light but sometimes it would station at a red like glow. it then changed direction and seemed to come toward us, but then just seemed to rise and move to the north east towards the moon and orions belt. at this point it rose to the height of the clouds, maybe even a little higher. when it reached that height it started changing direction at will, moving up or down, and at one point it seemed to zig-zag/slither. after a while we lost track of it as it seemed to blend in with the stars.

approximately 30 minutes later of the occurrence it appeared again at what seemed to be the same place. it behaved exactly the same way and did the same things as in the other occurrence. this time we were able to capture video of it, since during the first occurrence we were a bit shocked and the battery of our phones went out. also, i was able to see it before it started dropping the objects, so we had more time to capture its initial behavior. before it started dropping the objects it seemed to drop some star like objects which would some times glow a lot or simply looked like a star. the ufo also would seemingly glow a lot and go back to its "original"state. since we were capturing these videos through our phones, it is hard to see what truly happened, and after it started going further away it became harder and harder to capture on video, so we only recorded the when it appeared. the footage captures about i would say 30% of the magnitude of what we saw with our naked eye.

later in the night, maybe also 30-45 minutes after the second occurrence it seemed to appear again, this time much further away near the horizon. the light it emitted was red. it then moved to the west and slowly disappeared. 

this event was by far the weirdest thing me and my 2 friends ever saw. nothing we have ever seen remotely behaved like this. at first i was particularly scared because the explosions seemed bizarre and could be releasing something in the air, but eventually we all calmed down. after the event we did some studying to try and see the distance the object was by the time sound took to reach us, which we came to the conclusion it was about 2km away. we ruled out chinese lanterns and drones as it would have to be pretty big to be able to carry the objects it dropped and also since it got to the height of the clouds it'd be very hard maybe even impossible for a balloon or drone to achieve those heights.

the first video 2502 is of the first occurrence. the second one 2504 is of when it appeared again. the third 2506 is right after that when it started dropping the objects that seemed to explode. the last 2505 is when it started going to the west and leaving behind some star like objects which you can see when zoomed in.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: A strange star-like light appeared and started dropping similar objects with explosions

content.detailedDescription: I first seen an egg like one outside my bedroom window when i was seven and i seen the one i just described above on the exact same date time the only thi ng difference is the address and city.
content.summary: Huge

content.detailedDescription: See supra
content.summary: Phone disruption whiled, ecending mt charleston, steped out of car to recall & noticed object strek by @ hi rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger travelling on hwy 26 in s. idaho, toward arco.  i wanted to take a picture of a us government installation hidden behind a hill.  as i pointed my camera toward the hill, which was now behind us, i saw two shiny objects moving in a straight trajectory away from the government compound.  i zoomed in with my phone camera and took a picture.  to me the shiny objects looked like they were on a truck bed.  i took a couple more shots of the objects.  in one of the pictures i could not see the objects on my screen, even though i could see them with my eyes, so i aimed carefully and took another picture.  in the remaining pictures i can only see the objects in the picture that doesn't have two strange, nearly vertical anomolies in the pictures.  in the picture where i can see the objects, they are no longer on any supporting truck-like object.  it was about this time that the objects took off at double the speed they had been going before.  the shiny objects continued to 'fly' above the ground in a straight trajectory. then, we drove around the bend in the road and i could no longer see the objects.
content.summary: I saw 2 shiny objects travelling at our car speed.  suddenly they sped up to about double our speed.  i thought they were trucks but in my final photos, no truck structure is visible

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from my friends house really early in the morning out in the countryside around 1:00am - 3:00am. i did not have a ride home and needed to be back by 6:00am to wake my brother up for school. i was in the middle of a backroad in the countryside no cars around no street lights or people it was just me and my phone was almost dead so i was truely alone. i was looking up in the sky at all the stars just thinking about whats out there and how little we know. i continued gazing at the sky for a long period of time when i caught eye to a group of larger appering bright white lights they kinda looked like stars although they were not ordarny looking considering they wer much closer than all the other ones and appeared inside our atmosphere and so close togher. about 3 minutes had passed and all of a sudden a red light flashes in the middle of all 3 white lights and has an uneven but simetric pattern. to put it in simple words it would flash once every 5 seconds but on some 10 or 15 seconds would pass before the flash. i found this very odd as the object was in the same spot for over 2 minutes no flashing then this starts, as i continued to watch it for another minute or so just sitting there clueless of what it was, it started to move at a rapid speed. after about 5 seconds of this object in movement it went from 0km/h to well over 250km/h and vanished leaving behind a bright flash and blue faze, i think the blue faze was the ufo going through our atmosphere at an incredable speed. ive seen thousands of planes, helicopters and sattalites in my life over and over every day but ive never seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Black disk-like object with white ststionary lights and red flashing light.

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home.  looked up in the sky and noticed that silver disc in sky. it had two lights on the front of it. the lights went shining. it was moving from west side of city coming towards us.  we both stared at it and the it turned to right so i could notice more of it's formation and light structure. the two lights look more like old round ones.  then all of sudden it disappeared.  there were no clouds in the area.
content.summary: We where coming home and noticed this silver disc in sky with lights

content.detailedDescription:
no dia 27/11/2015, eu estava na minha sala vendo teve com minha esposa, quando levantei para fechar a cortina da varanda, e percebi alguns pontos de iluminaã§ã£o na base do morro sã£o joã£o que fica de frente para o meu apartamento(3km). pensei ser farã³is de carros trafegando na auto estrada, mas descartei logo, pois estavam estacionã¡rios e movimentando se de maneira lenta mas regular e sincronizada. quando notei que realmente era uma anomalia luminosa ali naquele local, eu imediatamente comecei a descartar hipã³teses de que seria qualquer objeto conhecido como aviãµes, helicã³pteros, drones, balãµes, sinalizadores(aã©reos e marã­timos) enfim, e logo entã£o mudei de posiã§ã£o para melhor ver aquela luz. subi para 3âº andar do prã©dio e de lã¡ avistei com muita clareza o evento de que se tratava aquela luminosidade. percebi que eram na verdade vã¡rias luzes pairando entre 200mt da base do morro e acima do nã­vel do mar de 100 a 150mt. estavam sobre o rio sã£o joã£o, em uma curva situada a lateral do morro. tinha uma luz muito mais forte do que as outras que circulava ao redor das menores, essa maior tinha a coloraã§ã£o branca mas porã©m um pouco avermelhada laranja, que oscilava entre o vermelho forte e o branco. neste ponto do evento, eu desci e confirmei a minha esposa que se tratava realmente de algo incomum naquela noite escura. peguei minha luneta e atravessei a rua e subi em cima de um morro que fica em frente a minha residencia(25/30 metros de altura). quando cheguei lã¡ em cima pude ver com muita clareza pois as luzes ambientes da rua nem do prã©dio podiam mais interferir. na sequencia a luz maior que circundava as outras parou, e as menores por sua vez posicionaram se ao redor formando um triangulo obtusã¢ngulo, dai entã£o apareceu mais uma luz que vinha direto do morro e se juntou a formaã§ã£o, demorou algo em torno de 20 minutos a mesma luz que saiu direto do morro, voltou lentamente para a base do morro e em sequencia as outras menores foram seguindo em fila indiana excepcionalmente metrados, muito bem divididos, que fiquei impressionado com aquela exatidã£o na formaã§ã£o. as luzes seguiam atã© a luz que veio direto do morro e iam sumindo, uma a uma, sendo que a luz mais intensa ficou na mesma posiã§ã£o em que estava quando se formou o triangulo, ela permanecia oscilando entre vermelho laranja e branco, quando todas as luzes chegaram a base do morro e sumiram, restou apenas a luz maior e a luz que estava na base do morro " recepcionando" as outras luzes menores. por fim essa luz se apagou lentamente, e a luz maior ficou estã¡tica e foi se apagando lentamente, mas nã£o completamente, com a luneta dava pra perceber que ela ainda estava lã¡, porã©m sem luz acesa forte, mas uma luz de baixa emissã£o de luminosidade, era quase imperceptã­vel, as vezes ela piscava forte e apagava, e oscilou modestamente, atã© eu estar completamente cheio de picadas de insetos, e nã£o aguentar mais ficar ali.
 enquanto refletia sobre oque tinha acabado de ver, olhei em direã§ã£o ao local onde elas estavam e pensei, "eu vejo vocãªs, eu sei que estã£o ai" incrivelmente a luz da base e a luz maior piscaram  sequencialmente e se apagaram por completo, que nã£o dava mais para ver reflexos e nem sobras. ali percebi que realmente tinha se finalizado o evento. na noite seguinte acordei(3:15 am)com a persiana do meu quarto aberta, entã£o levantei e fui fechar, quando percebi que em cima das caixas de ã¡gua da fazenda que fica no morro sã£o joã£o, pairavam as mesmas luzes da noite anterior, a vermelha forte e as mesmas que a cercavam noutro evento. ficaram por cerca de 30 minutos atã© seguirem em fila para outro ponto do morro ao qual eu nã£o tive acesso visual. desde entã£o fico vigiando essa ã¡rea, jã¡ pensei em ir atã© lã¡ investigar, fazer uma entrevista com os moradores da fazenda, que estã£o diretamente envolvidos no fenã´meno, pois essas luzes passam por cima da cabeã§a deles, pairam sobre a caixa da ã¡gua deles, algum contato jã¡ deve ter sido feito com eles, creio eu.
 esse foi o relato mais detalhado que eu pude dar. 
obs.: jã¡ tive muitas outras experiencias com esse tipo de fenã´meno aui na minha regiã£o a qual moro jã¡ faz mais de 18 anos, e acreditem aqui ã© um hotspot ufolã³gico certificado.
grato pela atenã§ã£o.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out in our garden around 8.20am - i was explaining to him what the gardener needed to attend to for the day when a rowdy flock of birds - swallows it seemed, were flocking and screeching agitatedly - like birds do when insects are around. i glanced up to see what the fuss was about and as they cleared, i noticed a pinpoint of light in the sky - like s star. i thought 'that cant be right - the sun's too high for a star to be visible'. i turned to my husband to ask him if he could see it, but he couldnt focus on what i was pointing at.
then i noticed a second pinpoint of light. then a third. and a fourth. i thought 'what the heck is this? am i really seeing what i'm seeing?' then more appeared to the left of those and over the course of about 5-10 minutes the bunch to the left clustered together in the centre which freaked me out. i counted 14 at one point and kept recounting to keep track which became impossible as they were drifting across the sky - becoming separated as some moved and others trailed behind. at one point i ran to get my cellphone to call the local radio station to report it and hopefully that others could see what i was seeing. my husband could make out some of what i was seeing, but his eyesight at that distance wasn't great. these objects were far. high. as far as one would judge the stars at night.
they moved across the sky in a high arc from se to nw. i called the neighbours to come and see. her son saw it as well, but she couldn't make anything out clearly. and neither could another neighbour. the talk radio host must have thought i was nuts when i eventually spoke to him...
two clusters had formed an identical pattern - like an arrow with a tail (like a christmas tree) still moving further north, with two loosely positioned in between. one of the objects, i noticed, looked a bit longer vertically, than the rest. after the clusters formed and drifted for several minutes, they faded from sight - possibly from the sun behind me as it created a white haze. when i eventually went back inside it was just before 9am. i've felt gobsmacked for the entire day - wondering who i could relate this to that would take me seriously. but, whether believed or not, i saw what i saw. i kept going outside the entire day to see if it would appear again. if i had to offer a thought i would say the mood was like a casual morning outing, trailing across our morning sky. i reckon they thought they wouldnt be noticed because of the sun's white haze. i wondered at the time what this meant for the human race. anything that can enter our space - without detection? - surely has better technology than we do and is therefore intelligent. if they pose a threat then what chance would we stand? i'm still freaked out when i think of that first cluster. what do they want here?
content.summary: I witnessed starlike objects - in broad daylight - appearing, moving across the sky in an arc. several formed two identical formations, then faded from sight.

content.detailedDescription: More to come
content.summary: Orbs in pairs and cluster gathered overhead they play with me when tone are used and intent

content.city: York and other areas in s
content.detailedDescription:
The first time i saw one i was seventeen.. that was was traditional ufo circular with flashing lights.  i work doing home health and smoke so i go outside to smoke. the first time i kept feeling like being watched but thought it was animals. two weeks prior i kept seeing what i thought were fireworks around nine thirty at night off to the south. then saw a colorful circle shape across from where i slept the following week i saw what i thought were fireworks on the ocean horizon. then it became white and  move south so thought was a barge.  then i saw three diamond shapes combine to two to one then three ect.  i did not know what was going on so it scared me and i was talking to a guy i use to date at the time so he knew the fear i had.  the colorful circle stayed across from where i slept the whole night.  i got up as client need to go to bathroom and would look over the ocean and it still was there.  i was scared but went back the following week.  when i went back i was out smoking around 8 pm and from behind me over the roof of the house a black triangle plan flew slowly over my head with no sound.  i did not know what it was but knew it was not an american plane.  no lights flashing and it proceed to go over the ocean faster.  about an hr or hr and half later i went back to the room where i sleep and saw a beam of light come down on the deck outside where i sleep.I also saw about 10 white orbs on the ocean horizon spread across the ocean with and additional one going back and forth flashing lights.  the ones on the ocean just pulsated. this really scared me and i went to the other side of the house and was afraid to go back to the bedroom.  when i did go back i closed the curtain which i never did as i love falling asleep to the ocean waves prior to these events.  i of course prayed as i was scared to death at this point and contacted my boss the next day to tell her what i saw and that i did not want to continue going there on sat. nights and was taken off the schedule. i did show several co workers the pics i took and when blow them up u see faces.  i will add that seeing these orbs started during the blue moon.  my cell camera picked it up but u could not see to the naked eye. i went to another clients house two streets from long sands beach and continued to see craft up in the air on the ocean. i just watched them and at some points i saw them coming from ne at dusk heading to the ocean and some would go s and some would go n along the beach and those that headed out stayed stationary on the ocean horizon spread apart like i noticed earlier at other clients house.  i would pick up orbs blue, white and i think yellow to when ever i took picks outside no matter where i was.  even inland and visiting people.  it also affected my phone made lines and a circle that moved every time i turned on my phone.  i have been taking pics then videos for months as proof to what i have seen and started talking to others and showing them these and showing if saw them when with family and friends  the activity i saw when working on the ocean has been crazy and scary at times.  i also saw lights in a house the next street over from clients house they would dim the get really bright and had a flash that appeared to go around like a light house light and one of the orbs or ships whatever it is was not on ocean horizon but was at the house next store to this house appearing to be on the ground.  i have been seeing this stuff for months and see them where ever i go.  was at my oldest sons house and needed something at the grocery store i parked and looked up to see a craft hovering for maybe a min then it flew off.  it seemed like they want me to know they are there and watching me.  i do not have any mental issues and a very strong smart woman but we all know how some people feel about ufos.  where i live not i showed my sister one stationary in the sky  appearing to be a star and then two planes came over head seconds apart.  i told her no plane flies that close together unless military.  to me it seems like every time i went out day or night there were planes in my area or the star like stationary orbs and this is everywhere i go.  i use to see  one or two of the white planes leaving a trail behind. the past few weeks i have seen six one day as i traveled to work in the sky all heading south as i was and a few went south east.  the day before thanksgiving brought my client to get a hair cut and saw at least eight or the trail of them.. i do have video of this as well.  she thought it was them bringing back troops overseas but again planes do not fly that close as these were. i also have a  video of two of them with alot or trails from other ones one going south one going north.  the activity in the york beach area is crazy esp dusk as they all head to the area.. but they are active throughout the night going north to south over the ocean area.  i do not have pics on my computer to send but if u contact me with an email address i will send u pics and videos taken over the past few months.   
thanks and if u need to contact me the phone is best way to do this
julie
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Over the ocean appeared to be fireworks then saw barge with three diamonds that combined to two and one.. following week had black triangle plane directly over my head with no sound felt like i could touch it was so close then and hr later saw a beam
content.locationName: York and other areas in s, Maine

content.detailedDescription:
While standing outside with my brother smoking a cigarette i saw a light appear over my brothers left shoulder.  my brother quickly turned around to see what i was looking at, and it quickly became clear that the light i saw was in fact 3 lights each at the corner of a black triangle craft.  this craft flew directly over the yakima training center.  where, at the time, i was working as a department of the army police officer.  
the craft originating in the north i believe, continued south, coming straight towards my brother and i.  the craft then flew over our heads and continued south till neither of us could see it anymore.  the craft was low for an aircraft, but still at a decent altitude.  it only took the craft about 45 seconds to span the horizon, yet it never broke the sound barrier, and in fact made no sound what so ever.  neither of us had any type of camera.
content.summary: Triangle craft spanning the horizon in less than a minute

content.detailedDescription: I/we hiked to the top of spencer butte on sunday afternoon (elevation 2055). i was taking random photos of the views-east and west. i took a few photos facing directly into the sun to try and get a shot of mountain ranges on the west side of the top of the mountain. it was a clear-bright sunny day. i did not see the object in the sky as i could't see much facing into the sun. it wasn't until looking at the photos once at the bottom of the mountain and on our way home that i looked through the photo's and saw the bright yellow circle. i have no idea what it is-maybe just a reflection of the sun of some sorts, who knows, but i have captured it in 3 different photo's. it appears to be in a slightly different location in each photo. i zoomed in and cropped the photo of the orb and there are white spots on it. the white spots are different in location and number on two of the three photos. on the third photo the colors were distorted and it is too fuzzy to see any details by enlarging/cropping. i am putting 1 as the number of witnesses below because it is required but i only saw it later in the photo's, the sun was too bright to have seen it while taking the photos.
content.summary: Only captured the object on camera after hiking to the top of spencer butte in eugene - was facing the sun. did not see it until looking at pictures later.

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming a distant plane that was heading north towards me from my bedroom window at around 13:40. the plane must have been only a few thousand feet in altitude as it had probably taken off from bournemouth airport around 25 miles away.
  the camcorder used was a sony dcr dvd106e, in ir nightshot mode with a 850nm ir pass filter and a x2 tele lens producing 80x optical zoom. as i was filming the plane, a white sphere slowly ascended into shot past the plane to around a few hundred feet below it. then the object started to accelerate on the same path of the plane appearing to give chase. luckily, the object passed over me giving me a chance to capture it on film. finally losing sight of the object as it passed over my house.
content.summary: Sphere descends from the sky above and tracks plane.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 friends were standing in their alley behind my grandmother's house when noticed a circular craft hovering about 3  to 5 hundred feet directly above us. it hovered for about 2 or 3 minutes then shoot up about 1000 feet moving north west turned 45 degrees then shoot straight into space in 1 or 2 seconds. we ran to my house and explained what happen to my older sister who called them airport who explained to her something showed up on radar.   2 more events happen over my life
content.summary: Disk hovered then accelerated away

content.detailedDescription:
I am not the actual witness, he is a friend named john pilato. he told me that he saw the lights moving slowly overhead in formation in a south west direction. he was walking west on latta road 3300 block, heading toward flynn road. he said the lights would randomly change color from red to white and blink out and reappear in a different location. he also said there was no noise.

i am attaching the (4) photos he took with his phone.

there is also a short video i can send you if you are interested in seeing that too. let me know?

-steve d.
content.summary: About 9 flashing red to white lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
When: middle of the day, during spring or summer of 1980 (approx)
where: next to methow river, next to a natural spring, near the end of wilson rd., due south of winthrop, wa in yakima county.
who: i was about 11 years old
what: i was taking a walk around this area when i suddenly awoke, on the ground, in a clearing a small distance from where i was last. it was over an hour later. 
     during this elapsed time i remember speaking with an entity in the spot where i woke up.. the entity was humanoid, adult sized, and was white. i believe there was another, shorter one behind it. it was not a ghost. it had physicality to it. i do not recall what we spoke about.
     there was a great brightness behind and/or above the entities. it was a very white light.
     during the event i primarily felt at peace, with some small part of me feeling upset. after the event i had a peaceful/fearful feeling for the area in which i awoke. i also was baffled by the missing time because i had difficulty remembering and believing my experience with the entities.
content.summary: Methow valley, wa abduction

content.detailedDescription:
The photos of an unidentified flying object (ufo) has been going viral on social media after it was reportedly caught on camera in uttar pradesh on saturday.

the ufo, a huge disc-shaped flying object, was reportedly caught hovering over padri market in gorakhpur. 

rumours are doing the rounds on the web that the ufo was the same object that was spotted in lucknow and kanpur a few months ago. 

who reportedly said the object was rotating on its own. the photos have been widely circulated on messaging apps such as whatsapp and social networking sites including facebook and twitter.

however, the district administration has dismissed the rumours, saying it was just another hoax.
content.summary: He saw a saucer shaped, light emitting object in the sky. he immediately took the picture of that object in his cell phone

content.detailedDescription:
Unsere hotelcams haben die ihnen gesendete aufnahmen gemacht! bei bewegung nehmen unsere cams immer 10 sec. ein video auf! als ich dann am tag darauf die aufgenommen bilder gesehen habe, war ich erstmal sprachlos. ich muãÿte sie mir einpaar mal ansehen, bis ich verstand was ich da sehe!!! als ich dann
noch mehr bildmaterial anschaute, machte ich eine 2 entdeckung! das raumschiff hat wahrscheinlich eines oder 2 der fremden lebensform hier abgesetzt. denn in unserem restaurant erscheint immer ein lichtkegel, wo ich vermute das es tarnvorrichtung fã¼r diese lebensform ist!!?? denn ich habe 2 aufnahmen wo sich die lebensform entarnt hat. bilder anbei. bitte um ihre meinung. danke mikel
content.summary: Aufnahme ã¼ber unsere restaurant terrasse /ufo

content.detailedDescription:
i saw this strange floating ball of very bright light in rome sunday evening 11/15. it seemed to be a metallic bronze but also a glowing aura around it. it was silent, and gave an illusion that appeared to slowly float left right coming close and moving away, but this thing was actually very fast, like nothing i have ever seen . it was not a plane nor drone. it was not chinese lantern. it glowed brighter when it was moving and dimmed at times when it seemed further away. 


what an interesting time to be alive.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb over rome. floated around a while whimsically.

content.detailedDescription:
I was shooting few videos of the evening sunset which i usually do via my lenovo mobile phone.
later when i imported the videos, this one had a peculiar image in frame no. 002, i thought it could be some dust or some camera issue.
but yet this is peculiar.
none of my other videos have such a distortion.

please find attached video and a screenshot of that particular moment.
i need to know what this could be?
ufo? or just some dust, but this is too fast and the shape is interesting.

i have submitted the video as is, i have not done any editing via any software.
the screenshots are of the video.
content.summary: An interesting object appears and disappears in less than second.

content.detailedDescription: I work straight nights i went out for break at 1am i walked around the corner of the building and im kinda lost for words. there was six white non blinking lights in a horizontal row with a slight bow in the center.  i dont know if it was one single craft or six in formation but as it got closer four (the two outside sets) of lights went out makeing it appear smaller a few seconds later a red blinker came on way over the top of the remaining two lights. im familliar with planes in the night sky and area and iv not seen this before.. when i first observed the lights i ran back in the shop to get someone else to witness what i was seeing. with no one around i ran back out and continued watching it. from first sight i knew this was unusual i have only told my wife about this i instantly felt like people are going to think im crazy. i have no photos or video just my word and even that cant give justice to what i witnessed
content.summary: 6 bright lights either one craft or six in formation
